properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 6 at 4:41AM AKST until January 8 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
Expect wind chills to 55 below zero.

* WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast.

* WHEN...9 AM Tuesday to 9 AM Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to increase Tuesday
morning and cause very cold wind chills. Wind chills are very
cold now, but an advisory is not issued unless the winds are 15
mph or greater.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY
